markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Whirlwind Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=4847) <actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 150 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 84 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Wylderheart](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=318) (Level 16)

</column>

---

You lash out in a blur of motion, attacking all nearby adversaries. Make a melee Strike against each enemy within your melee reach. Each attack counts toward your multiple attack penalty, but you do not increase your penalty until you have made all your attacks.
name: Whirlwind Strike

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 14" pfs="Standard" > Whirlwind Strike Three Actions Source Player Core pg. 150 2.0 , Player Core 2 pg. 84 1.1 Archetype Wylderheart (Level 16) --- You lash out in a blur of motion, attacking all nearby adversaries. Make a melee Strike against each enemy within your melee reach. Each attack counts toward your multiple attack penalty, but you do not increase your penalty until you have made all your attacks.
